entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT ENDED, Richmond

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 7.4°C

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain. High 10.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 near the water early this afternoon. High 10. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending late this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 then southwest 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Tuesday 27 December 2022
